title: Любовь в нерабочие недели
overview: Spring 2020. All of Russia is in quarantine and self-isolation, including three very specific Russian families. Of course, each of them is unhappy in their own way.Andrey and Kristina are worried about the cancellation of their planned wedding, but do not lose hope of getting married on "udalenka". Valera and Ira find out that they have been deceiving each other for a long time, but this discovery becomes the beginning of a new stage in their relationship and the first step to trust. And Garik finds himself at home not only with his wife Sonya, but also with her mother: the mother-in-law came from Belarus and now can not go back.
